de.ra.coc.ServerConnection

Class HttpConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ra.coc.ServerConnection.HttpConnection

  • public class HttpConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the functionality to connect to the Clash of Clan server and retrieves the results.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String API_LINK
      Class of Clan server's link

      static org.json.JSONObject connectAndGetResults(java.lang.String link, java.lang.String tag, java.lang.String JWTOKEN)
      This method connects to the provided Class of Clan API link and returns the result in JSONObject format.

    • Method Detail

      • connectAndGetResults

        public static org.json.JSONObject connectAndGetResults(java.lang.String link,
                                                       java.lang.String tag,
                                                       java.lang.String JWTOKEN)
                                                throws COCServerConnectionException,
                                                       InvalidItemTagException
        This method connects to the provided Class of Clan API link and returns the result in JSONObject format.
        Parameters:
        link - Complete link.
        tag - Tag. It can be Player tag, Clan tag or null.
        JWTOKEN - JWToken.
        Returns:
        Result of the request in JSONObject format.
        Throws:
        COCServerConnectionException - If fails to connect to the Clash of Clan server.
        InvalidItemTagException - If the given tag is invalid.
